background_color.info: Determines the background color of the block when no media is used or when using the "Contain" Media Fit setting.
background_color.label: Background

video_url.info: Use a direct link to an .mp4 video file. [Learn more here](https://fluorescent.co/help/context/2-column-mosaic-grid#add-mosaic-blocks-with-videos).
video_url.label: Video link

background_color.info: Determines the background color of the block when no media is used or when using the "Contain" Media Fit setting.
background_color.label: Background

video_url.info: Use a direct link to an .mp4 video file. [Learn more here](https://fluorescent.co/help/context/3-column-mosaic-grid#add-mosaic-blocks-with-videos).
video_url.label: Video link

heading.info: Include a heading that explains the content.
heading.label: Accordion heading

show_dynamic_checkout.info: Using the payment methods available on your store, customers see their preferred option, like PayPal or Apple Pay. [Learn more](https://help.shopify.com/manual/using-themes/change-the-layout/dynamic-checkout)
show_dynamic_checkout.label: Show dynamic checkout buttons

show_dynamic_policies.info: This note changes depending on your store's [tax settings](/admin/settings/taxes) and [shipping policy](/admin/settings/legal)
show_dynamic_policies.label: Show dynamic policies

inventory_max.info: Enter the initial quantity of your product inventory. Insert a Dynamic source to set different base quantities for multiple products. [Learn more](https://fluorescent.co/help/context/product-pages#stock-level-indicator)
inventory_max.label: Inventory base quantity

low_inventory_threshold.info: Set the product inventory quantity to alert customers when limited quantities are available. Insert a Dynamic source to set different thresholds for multiple products. [Learn more](https://fluorescent.co/help/context/product-pages#stock-level-indicator)
low_inventory_threshold.label: Low inventory threshold

popup__header.info: Add a popup to display extra information about your products, like a size guide.

show_swatches.info: Add swatch image files to your store's [files area](/admin/settings/files). Make sure the file names match the names of your color variants. For example, a variant called Blue would need a file called 'blue.png'
show_swatches.label: Show swatches

variant_popup_option.info: Write the option name that will display a link to the information popup. Example: "Size".
variant_popup_option.label: Option name for Information popup

variant_popup_page.info: Choose a page as a source for the popup content. You can add text, tables, or images to this page.
variant_popup_page.label: Information popup content

menu.info: This menu won't show dropdown items.
menu.label: Menu

currency__header.info: To add a currency, go to your [payment settings](/admin/settings/payments)

language__header.info: To add a language, go to your [language settings](/admin/settings/languages)

dropdown_parent_link.info: Name the link in the main menu that you'd like the Mega nav to appear from.
dropdown_parent_link.label: Dropdown parent link

header_alignment.info: Alignment will only apply if Header Style is Inline links
header_alignment.label: Alignment

sticky_header_logo.info: Sticky header logo will appear when the header becomes sticky. Maximum logo height: 50px
sticky_header_logo.label: Sticky header logo image

transparent_header_border_color.info: Only applicable if transparent header is enabled.
transparent_header_border_color.label: Border color

transparent_header_foreground_color.info: Only applicable if transparent header is enabled.
transparent_header_foreground_color.label: Text color

pagination.info: This setting determines how additional pages of products are navigated.
pagination.label: Pagination

swatches__paragraph.content: Add swatch image files to your store's [files area](/admin/settings/files). Make sure the file names match the names of your color variants. For example, a variant called Blue would need a file called 'blue.png'

paragraph.content: All of your collections are listed by default. To customize your list, choose 'Selected' and add collection blocks.

heading.label: Accordion heading

paragraph__header.content: The product image grid pulls images directly from the product.

skip_first_image.info: Skip the first product image in this section to avoid repeating the first visible image within the product overview section.
skip_first_image.label: Skip first product image

paragraph.content: The Map address field will need to be filled for the directions link to show

api_key.info: You'll need to register a Google Maps API key to display the map.
api_key.label: Google Maps API key

image.info: Choose an image to represent your store. This will also function as a fallback image if the map doesn't load.
image.label: Image

map_address.info: *Required. Google Maps will find the exact location.
map_address.label: Map address

paragraph.content: For help setting up this section please visit our [documentation](https://fluorescent.co/help/context/map).
Any customers who subscribe will have an account created for them in Shopify. [View customers](/admin/customers?query=&accepts_marketing=1)

enable.info: Show a popup the first time the user's cursor leaves your site.
enable.label: Enable

paragraph.content: This section will only appear if a user has viewed more than 3 products.

image.info: Landscape orientation (3:2 w:h). 1440 x 960px minimum recommended.
image.label: Image

link_text.info: The entire slide will become a link if this setting is left blank.
link_text.label: Link text

video_url.info: Use a direct link to an .mp4 video file.
video_url.label: Video link

cart_quick_shop_show_quantity_input.info: If quantity inputs are hidden, quantities will default to 1.
cart_quick_shop_show_quantity_input.label: Show quick shop quantity input

enable_ajax.label: Show notification when item is added to cart

favicon.info: Will be scaled down to 32 x 32px
favicon.label: Favicon image

swatch_options.info: Variant option name to use for displaying swatches. Use a comma separated list to support multiple options: "Color, Material"
swatch_options.label: Variant option for swatches
